projects.title: CWCAGScanner - Advanced Accessibility Testing Platform
projects.description: Effortless accessibility compliance with automated WCAG scanning. Get instant, actionable reports covering WCAG 2.0, 2.1, and 2.2 at all compliance levels with developer-friendly visual guides.

projects.title: Project A - JavaScript Testing Framework
projects.description: A modern, lightweight JavaScript testing framework designed for speed and simplicity. Perfect for unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing workflows.

projects.title: Project B - React UI Component Library
projects.description: A comprehensive collection of accessible, customizable React components built with TypeScript and modern design principles. Perfect for building scalable web applications.
